description: When a dialog is generated one of the boilerplate tasks is to add the type to DialogType class for the new dialog. This modification performs that action.
error: It seems your file for DialogType class is not in lib/enums/dialog_type.dart. Add a stacked.json file and set the path for \'dialog_type_file_path\' to the folder so we can locate your DialogType class.
name: Add \'{{dialogType}}\' value to DialogType
